title: Tadco farms, Tabuk, Saudi Arabia
description: Tabuk, also spelled Tabouk, is the capital city of the Tabuk Region in northwestern Saudi Arabia. It has a population of 534,893 (2010 census). Tabuk is close to the Jordan–Saudi Arabia border. It houses the largest air force base in Saudi Arabia.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
